00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : MPI_UpdateHydro
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateHydro
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE Domain
00033  USE FluidParams
00034  USE LBMParams
00035  USE MPIParams
00036  USE MPI
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 ! Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00041  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00042  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00043 
00044 
00045 !-------- Save velocity and pressure from the real nodes at the boundaries -----
00046 ! X DIRECTION
00047  count = 1
00048  DO j = yl, yu
00049    hydro_west_snd(count    ) = u(xl,j,1)
00050    hydro_west_snd(count + 1) = u(xl,j,2)
00051    hydro_west_snd(count + 2) = p(xl,j)
00052 
00053    hydro_east_snd(count    ) = u(xu,j,1)
00054    hydro_east_snd(count + 1) = u(xu,j,2)
00055    hydro_east_snd(count + 2) = p(xu,j)
00056    count = count + 3
00057  END DO
00058 
00059 ! Y DIRECTION
00060  count = 1
00061  DO i = xl, xu
00062    hydro_south_snd(count    ) = u(i,yl,1)
00063    hydro_south_snd(count + 1) = u(i,yl,2)
00064    hydro_south_snd(count + 2) = p(i,yl)
00065 
00066    hydro_north_snd(count    ) = u(i,yu,1)
00067    hydro_north_snd(count + 1) = u(i,yu,2)
00068    hydro_north_snd(count + 2) = p(i,yu)
00069    count = count + 3
00070  END DO
00071 
00072 ! NORTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00073  hydro_ne_snd(1) = u(xu,yu,1)
00074  hydro_ne_snd(2) = u(xu,yu,2)
00075  hydro_ne_snd(3) = p(xu,yu)
00076 
00077 ! NORTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00078  hydro_nw_snd(1) = u(xl,yu,1)
00079  hydro_nw_snd(2) = u(xl,yu,2)
00080  hydro_nw_snd(3) = p(xl,yu)
00081 
00082 ! SOUTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00083  hydro_sw_snd(1) = u(xl,yl,1)
00084  hydro_sw_snd(2) = u(xl,yl,2)
00085  hydro_sw_snd(3) = p(xl,yl)
00086 
00087 ! SOUTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00088  hydro_se_snd(1) = u(xu,yl,1)
00089  hydro_se_snd(2) = u(xu,yl,2)
00090  hydro_se_snd(3) = p(xu,yl)
00091 
00092 !-------- Exchange information using MPI calls ---------------------------------
00093 ! X DIRECTION
00094  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_east_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00095  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_west_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00096  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00097 
00098  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_west_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00099  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_east_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00100  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00101 
00102 ! Y DIRECTION
00103  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_north_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00104  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_south_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00105  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00106 
00107  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_south_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00108  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_north_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00109  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00110 
00111 ! DIAGONALS
00112  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_ne_rcv, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00113  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_sw_snd, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00114  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00115 
00116  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_nw_rcv, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00117  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_se_snd, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00118  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00119 
00120  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_se_rcv, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00121  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_nw_snd, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00122  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00123 
00124  CALL MPI_IRECV(hydro_sw_rcv, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00125  CALL MPI_SEND( hydro_ne_snd, 3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00126  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00127 
00128 
00129 !-------- Update velocity and pressure at the ghost nodes ----------------------
00130 ! X DIRECTION
00131  count = 1
00132  DO j = yl, yu
00133    u(xug,j,1) = hydro_east_rcv(count)
00134    u(xug,j,2) = hydro_east_rcv(count + 1)
00135    p(xug,j)   = hydro_east_rcv(count + 2)
00136 
00137    u(xlg,j,1) = hydro_west_rcv(count)
00138    u(xlg,j,2) = hydro_west_rcv(count + 1)
00139    p(xlg,j)   = hydro_west_rcv(count + 2)
00140    count = count + 3
00141  END DO
00142 
00143 ! Y DIRECTION
00144  count = 1
00145  DO i = xl, xu
00146    u(i,yug,1) = hydro_north_rcv(count)
00147    u(i,yug,2) = hydro_north_rcv(count + 1)
00148    p(i,yug)   = hydro_north_rcv(count + 2)
00149 
00150    u(i,ylg,1) = hydro_south_rcv(count)
00151    u(i,ylg,2) = hydro_south_rcv(count + 1)
00152    p(i,ylg)   = hydro_south_rcv(count + 2)
00153    count = count + 3
00154  END DO
00155 
00156 ! NORTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00157  u(xug,yug,1) = hydro_ne_rcv(1)
00158  u(xug,yug,2) = hydro_ne_rcv(2)
00159  p(xug,yug)   = hydro_ne_rcv(3)
00160 
00161 ! NORTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00162  u(xlg,yug,1) = hydro_nw_rcv(1)
00163  u(xlg,yug,2) = hydro_nw_rcv(2)
00164  p(xlg,yug)   = hydro_nw_rcv(3)
00165 
00166 ! SOUTH-WEST DIAGONAL
00167  u(xlg,ylg,1) = hydro_sw_rcv(1)
00168  u(xlg,ylg,2) = hydro_sw_rcv(2)
00169  p(xlg,ylg)   = hydro_sw_rcv(3)
00170 
00171 ! SOUTH-EAST DIAGONAL
00172  u(xug,ylg,1) = hydro_se_rcv(1)
00173  u(xug,ylg,2) = hydro_se_rcv(2)
00174  p(xug,ylg)   = hydro_se_rcv(3)
00175 
00176 
00177  RETURN
00178  END SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateHydro
00179
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
